slide.title: Adding colors to the palette
slide.blurb: Unless a canvas is created based on an already existing image, creating an image with %imagecreate()% will not have any colors in its palette
Adding colors can be done in a number of different ways using the following function family:

list.bullet: %imagecolorallocate()% - Allocate a new color in the palette
%imagecolorexact()% - Attempt to find the specified color in an existing palette
%imagecolorclosest()% - Provide the closest match to the specified color
